description:
Research has shown consistently that many people list public speaking as their main fear. Forget phobias such as narrow spaces, dark, and spiders, standing up in front of a crowd and speaking is far more terrifying for most people. Through this course you will become more confident and relaxed in front of an audience which will translate into a successful speaking event.

However, mastering this fear and getting comfortable speaking in public can be a great confidence and self esteem booster, not to mention career development benefits. The Public Speaking training will give you some good public speaking skills, including in-depth information on developing an engaging speech and delivering your presentation with power.
title: Public Speaking: How To Be An Excellent Public Speaker
